title: Rosetta Stone 26 Languages Two Disc ISO
description:
=========================Credits================================================
OK...I took this torrent: 
  <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3496724/The_Rosetta_Stone_Language_System_-_27_Languages__41_Levels._FIX" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/3496724/The_Rosetta_Stone_Language_System_-_27_Languages__41_Levels._FIX</a>

and made some modifications. That torrent was confusing and complicating to most inexperienced users. So I made it simple for everyone to use and get started. 
================================================================================

=========================Modifications==========================================
*There are now 26 languages now instead of 27, because I felt English UK was pretty much the same as English US.

*I put the majority of level 1 on the same disc together, and all the level two on the second disc. There are however a few level 1s that are on the second disc due to lack of space.

*I made two ISOs for both levels. Rosetta_Stone_Disc_1.iso and Rosetta_Stone_Disc_2.iso.

*I also added the Rosetta Stone program to both discs, and I made an autorun.ini file to go with it.
===============================================================================

=========================How to Play===========================================
Simple!
Step 1: Open up the Rosetta_Stone.rar file using WinRAR. 

Step 2: Extract both Rosetta_Stone_Disc_1.iso (4.32 GB) and Rosetta_Stone_Disc_2.iso (4.08 GB) to somewhere on your hard drive.

Step 3: Burn the images seperatly with Nero to a DVD. 

Step 4: Place the DVD into your DVD ROM on your PC and get ready to learn! Enjoy!
===============================================================================

=========================Languages and Levels==================================

Disc1:

Arabic Level 1
Chinese Level 1
Cymraeg Level 1
Dansk Level 1
Deutsch Level 1
Spanish (Latin America) Level 1
French Level 1
Greek Level 1
Hebrew Level 1
Hindi Level 1
Indonesian Level 1
Italiano Level 1
Kiswahili Level 1
Latin Level 1
Nederlands Level 1
Portuguese Level 1
Polish Level 1
Russian Level 1
Spanish (Spain) Level 1
Svenska Level 1
Thai Level 1
Turkish Level 1
Vietnamese Level 1

Disc 2:

Arabic Level 2
Chinese Level 2
Deutsch Level 2
Spanish (Latin America) Level 2
English US level 1
English US level 2
French Level 2
Greek Level 2
Italiano Level 2
Japanese Level 1
Japanese Level 2
Korean Level 1
Nederlands Level 2
Portuguese Level 2
Russian Level 2
Spanish (Spain) Level 2
===================================Change Log===================================
I fixed Dansk and Hindi that was wrong with torrent 
  <a href="
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4087646/Rosetta_Stone_26_languages" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://thepiratebay.se/tor/4087646/Rosetta_Stone_26_languages</a>	

and added English to Disc 2. Sorry for the inconvience!!

I also fixed the second disc so it should work now! Just let me know if there are any problems.
